description:
Form field to handle a date/datetime value.

Bundles `k-date-input` with `k-calendar` and, optionally,
`k-time-input` with `k-times`.

Have a look at `<k-field>`, `<k-input>`
and `<k-datetime-input>` for additional information.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, the field is no longer editable and will not be saved

props.name: help
props.description: Optional help text below the field

props.name: label
props.description: A descriptive label for the field

props.name: name
props.description: A unique name for the input

props.name: required
props.description: If `true`, the field has to be filled in correctly to be submitted

props.name: after
props.description: Optional text that will be shown after the input

props.name: before
props.description: Optional text that will be shown before the input

props.name: icon
props.description: Icon used for the date input (and calendar dropdown)

props.name: value
props.description: Value must be provided as ISO date string

props.name: display
props.description: Format to parse and display the date

props.name: max
props.description: The last allowed date as ISO date string

props.name: min
props.description: The first allowed date as ISO date string

props.name: calendar
props.description: Deactivate the calendar dropdown or not

props.name: time
props.description:
Time options (e.g. `display`, `icon`, `step`).
Please check docs for `k-time-input` props.

props.name: times
props.description: Deactivate the times dropdown or not
